assetto_corsa.name: Assetto Corsa
assetto_corsa.description: Assetto Corsa is a sim racing video game developed by the Italian video game developer Kunos Simulazioni.

assetto_corsa_competizione.name: Assetto Corsa Competizione
assetto_corsa_competizione.description: Assetto Corsa Competizione is designed to faithfully recreate the performance and the driving experience of real GT World Challenge cars.

minecraft_alpha_beta.name: Minecraft Alpha & Beta
minecraft_alpha_beta.description: Bring back the golden age of Minecraft from 2010, and experience the nostalgia with your friends!

minecraft_bedrock_edition.name: Minecraft: Bedrock Edition
minecraft_bedrock_edition.description: Create anything you can imagine. Explore randomly generated worlds. Survive dangerous mobs at night.

minecraft_java_edition.name: Minecraft: Java Edition
minecraft_java_edition.description: Prepare for an adventure of limitless possibilities as you build, mine, battle mobs, and explore the ever-changing Minecraft landscape.

valheim.name: Valheim
valheim.description: Valheim is an open-world survival game played from a third-person perspective. As fallen Vikings, players must craft tools, build shelters and fight enemies to survive.
